title: Trying to mimic Andy Warhol classic Campbell's Soup painting
content:
Hey guys-

Trying to mimic the type from this Warhol print of Campell's Soup (all 4 faces)... having a tough time coming up with decent matches.  
I suppose the "Campbell's" is a hand drawn logo, but any thoughts on a similar substitute?  
Thanks for your input.

LD

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [warhol soup.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120221012503/http:/typophile.com/files/warhol%20soup.jpg) | 22.05 KB |
author: lauren d.

comments.content: Not a very close match but maybe helps a little - Casey Ultrabold here: [www.flashfonts.com/flashsite/fontspage.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20120221012503/http:/www.flashfonts.com/flashsite/fontspage.htm "www.flashfonts.com/flashsite/fontspage.htm")
